attributes.action: Make it illegal to prevent students from going to the tiolet during lessons
attributes.additional_details: I believe it’s unfair for me as a student to be told I can’t go to the tiolet during lessons
attributes.background: During lessons make it illegal for teachers to prevent students going to the tiolet, however in tests and mocks u can’t go to the tiolet during

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422

We also cannot accept petitions that do not include a full name.
